data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WWW::MakeAShorterLink is supplanted by WWW::Shorten (to be precise,
    WWW::Shorten::MakeAShorterLink).

    The WWW::Shorten hierarchy permits greater expansion and better
    categorisation. It also allows a standard interface to be expected.

    I believe it should be on the module list for the usual reason:
    people should know such modules and areas exist =)
